title: Portobello and shiitake mushroom stuffing
ingredients: ['4 stalks celery', '1 onion, chopped', '2 large portobello mushrooms, sliced', '3 fresh shiitake mushrooms, stemmed and sliced', '8 crimini mushrooms, sliced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1.25L (2 1/4 pints) chicken stock', '2 (170g) packets sage and onion stuffing mix']
